description: dashboard: store front page in memcache

messages.text:
Hello golang-dev@googlegroups.com,

I'd like you to review this change to
https://code.google.com/p/go

LGTM

You should probably set a TTL of, say, 10m on the memcache item.
There's several situations where it'll be annoying otherwise (e.g.
uploading a new version of the app) because you'd have to wait for a
builder to do something or a commit to arrive.


Dave.

*** Submitted as 32dccd3b0040 ***
